column4: can someone help me with my usb problem? I get this when i try to connect my gp2x which should be recognized as a usb drive:   hub 1-0:1.0: connect-debounce failed, port 2 disabled
wow, a gp2x, I want one! Sorry, no idea about the usb problem... tried connecting to another socket?
just got it today for my b-day yesterday :) can't get ubuntu to get it up right though
are you connecting it via a hub?
no i'm plugging it right in to the mobo
how big is the screen? I mean diameter in cm, roughly?
have you tried plugging it in, and then turning it on?
yeah just did, what does that message even meen?
I don't know, never seen it.
it might be something that you can ask their support to help fix
go figure the one it came with doesn't work
well done -- how did you work that out?
i remember reading somewhere on a review that someone else had that problem, so i tried another one i had
